caption.p: Immunofluorescence image of human airway epithelia (HAE) inserts infected with PeV-A1 and PeV-A3. Both genotypes appear to have a tropism for basal cells in the airway epithelium. Legend: Blue—DAPI (nuclei), Red—β-tub (ciliated cells), Green—PeV-A, and purple—p63 (basal cells). Image used under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution License (CC BY 4.0.) from Karelehto E. et al., 2018 [ 83].
